HOME.DESCRIPTION_1: As an AI chatbot, I'm here to help you understand the complex world of cancer on a molecular level. My goal is to make scientific information more accessible, providing clear explanations based on reliable sources.
HOME.DESCRIPTION_2: Please remember: I am an AI, not a medical professional. The information I share is for educational purposes only and should never be used for self-diagnosis or to make medical decisions. Always consult with a qualified healthcare provider for personalized medical advice and treatment.
